__e: I know you're having fun with your sister, her being, well, a dullard and all... but if Kelly doesn't get out of high school, she'll never leave home.
You may not have been telling us by - Being a jerk?
That's why he's so dumb... and knows nothing!
Please tell me which idiot did this.
If your dumb ass is the brains,then what the hell does that make me?
You're no dummy, Luke. We both know that.
But Mama, I'm tired of everybody calling' me a dummy. I'm tired of not havin' any friends.
You are a fool and I will show you none.
I have been a fool for too long.
And as long as you don't tell him, you get to be the good guy, and I'm just the chump who seduced his wife for the hell of it.
I tell you what to do, you do whatever the hell you want, somehow it all works out, and I'm the dumb-ass losing sleep over it.
"That's very interesting, because he's a dunce never reached the second book."
I'm just a hardhand [hat? head? ] just like you.
All right, to make it clear to a dumbhead like you... we take all his goods and go straight up north and leave the jackass flat.
Thank you for reminding me that I am the only woman in the whole world who could love an idiot like you.
